name: The Crossing (itch) (spatel30, PumpkinsPlunkingNotes)
description:
"The Crossing" is a short 3D first person atmospheric horror game.

Controls -

Boat: 

W, D - Move forward, backward
A, S - Turn left, turn right

P - Reset boat position (in case it sinks or anything like that)

E - Get on boat when near it, or also to get off boat (make sure you're near a island before you get off the boat to avoid sinking to ocean floor.)

Player:

W A S D - Movement

Shift - Sprint

E - Read notes when near them, interact, or to also get on/off boat.
